traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The sea drake can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The sea drake makes one bite attack and one tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is pulled within 5 feet of the sea drake and {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the drake can't use its tail on another target.
